name: Squish
tag_list: project-management, software, tools, hosted, web-based, collaboration
overview:
Squish is a cloud-based project management tool that enables companies to collaborate using any web browser, anytime and anywhere in the world.

No special hardware is required and there is no software to install and maintain. The intuitive interface allows project managers to easily customize projects with fields and layouts that use the same language terms that everyone can understand.

Whether you need a tool to track product development or manage client requests, Squish is equipped with features that help keep projects organized and teams informed: Squish comes with unlimited projects and unlimited users Automatic e-mail notifications keep team members informed of changes Status tracking and milestone features give real time insight as to what is being done Users can save and share search results Search results can be exported into Excel Calendar tracking allows users to manage time for deadlines Role based permissions allow teams to specify access API feature allows issues to be entered programmatically Squish comes with a free 60 day full featured trial
